12.heading: Tommy.
12.title: Junk, Sweet Junk
12.author: by Molly Wigand ; illustrated by Barry Goldberg.
notes: (Ready-to-Read)

Summary (from OCLC): Tommy, Chuckie, and Angelica help Tommy's grandfather throw away the useless junk he has accumulated, but the children find new uses for most of it and Grandpa decides it has value after all. Based on the animated television show Rugrats.
